name: Super Jump Star
description:
Super Jump Star is a super fun casual game that challenges your hand-eye coordination!

Tap to jump off the trampoline into the air and tap on it again before your jumping star reaches back to the trampoline.
Repeat, until your super jump star reaches the farthest corner of the Galaxy.


Features:
- Perfect design to keep you engaged for a long time
- Endless game mode
- Tablet support
- Global Leaderboards

Super Jump Star is for everyone and is completely FREE to play!
Now play and become the highest trampoline jumper in world!
